name: Catiators
description:
Catiators is a top-down competitive multi-player battle arena game where you can play as a variety of feline warriors. Pick from one of four classes (only two classes are available in the current version of the game), each with their own strengths and weaknesses, and fight it out with up to three friends in the arena featuring dangerous traps and helpful items. Knowing when to fight and when to flee is the key to survive in this action packed multi-player game.

Please note: the current build of the game is a work in progress and does not fully represent the finished product. Right now it only supports the keyboard or the XBOX 360. Your feedback will be instrumental in finalizing the full game.
